name: B. AB Flipping
statement:
You are given a string s of length n consisting of characters
texttt{A} and
texttt{B}. You are allowed to do the following operation: Choose an
index 1
le i
le n - 1 such that s_i =
texttt{A} and s_{i + 1} =
texttt{B}. Then, swap s_i and s_{i+1}. You are only allowed to do the
operation for each index 1
le i
le n - 1. However, you can do it in any order you want. Find the maximum
number of operations that you can carry out.
